text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the MSI GE Series GE65 Raider-049 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GE Series GE65 Raider-049 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE Series GE65 Raider-049 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GE Series GE65 Raider-049 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GE Series GE65 Raider-049 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i9 9th Gen 9880H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
